plot: Man who plans to commit suicide the next day finds a beautiful prostitute in a bar, and pays her to just listen to his story. But they get attached to each other, and the situation gets out of hand.
title: Incuráveis
plot_es: Man who plans to commit suicide the next day finds a beautiful prostitute in a bar, and pays her to just listen to his story. But they get attached to each other, and the situation gets out of hand.
plot_en: Man who plans to commit suicide the next day finds a beautiful prostitute in a bar, and pays her to just listen to his story. But they get attached to each other, and the situation gets out of hand.
